Mode.description: Whether the player is allowed to jump, or is only allowed to run.

Lines.description: How many spots there are to quickstep to.

PathUID.description: The UID of the path used by this object. This path is duplicated for each spot, based on the value of Lines.

Speed.description: How fast the player will run while contained within this volume.

StepWidth.description: The space in-between each spot the player can quickstep to.

Extra.value: Big invisible boxes (volumes) which cause a quick-stepping section.
